body: C Custer from China Geek blogs about the spread of "Jasmine revolution" through messages from outside China and the police's over reaction from inside China. He also records the "revolutionary atmosphere" in Beijing Wangfujing area.
original_body: C Custer from China Geek blogs about the spread of "Jasmine revolution" through messages from outside China and the police's over reaction from inside China. He also records the "revolutionary atmosphere" in Beijing Wangfujing area.
title: China: A staged revolution
